channel.title: Global Operations
channel.description: Global Operations is a team-based first-person shooter that places you with spec-ops forces, guerilla, terrorist, and other groups as well. It is also multiplayer and is sort of similar to Counter-Strike. It came out way back in 2002. Ever played it? I found it to be pretty enjoyable. Someone tried to remake it on source, but being the nubs they are, they didn't finish.

item.title: Global Operations
item.dc:creator: sofiadavis1
item.description:
As per my experience the premise behind Global Ops is simple one. There is no story here but there does not need to be since it’s primarily a multi player games without NPCs.Global Ops does indeed include a single-player game

Read full topic

item.title: Global Operations
item.dc:creator: InSovietRussia
item.description:
Global Operations is a team-based first-person shooter that places you with spec-ops forces, guerilla, terrorist, and other groups as well. It is also multiplayer and is sort of similar to Counter-Strike. It came out way back in 2002. Ever played it? I found it to be pretty enjoyable. Someone tried to remake it on source, but being the nubs they are, they didn’t finish.
